name: MAGIX Video
summary: Learn about .MXV files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: When exporting video from a MAGIX application, you can choose from various presets. For example, if you select File → Export movie → Video as MAGIX Video, you can choose from many presets.
Export settings include the resolution, frame rate, and interlace mode. You can also select a specific range of the video to export if you do not want to export the entire video.

instructions: You can open MXV files with various MAGIX applications, including Movie Studio and Photo Manager. For example, to open an MXV file, select File → Open.
MAGIX Movie Studio can convert MXV files to various file types, including the following formats:

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
